vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.4.2;
son of: Rimmon (H7417B);
brother of: Baanah (H1196)
§ Rechab = "rider"
n pr m
1) father of Jehonadab in the time of king Jehu of the northern kingdom of Israel
2) father of Malchijah, a leader of the district of Beth Haccerem and repairer of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
3) one of the 2 captains whom Ishbosheth took into his service and who conspired to murder him
Rechabites = see Rechab "rider"
adj pr
4) descendants of Rechab
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Rimón; asesino del rey Is-bóset; (b)   padre de Jonadab; ancestro de los recabitas; (c)   padre de Malquías, gobernador de distrito; en tiempos de Nehemías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利甲 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "騎師"
陽性專有名詞
1) 約拿達的父親, 約拿達是北國以色列耶戶王時的人 ( #王下 10:15| )
2) 瑪基雅的父親, 瑪基雅在尼希米時代是伯哈基琳人的領袖, 他參與了
重建耶路撒冷城牆的工作 ( #尼 3:14| )
3) 伊施波設帶領的兩位軍長之一, 他們背叛了伊施波設並謀刺了他 ( #撒下 4:2-6| )
利甲人 = 見利甲 "騎師" [參見7397]
形容詞, 種族名稱
4) 利甲的後裔
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
利甲 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "骑师"
阳性专有名词
1) 约拿达的父亲, 约拿达是北国以色列耶户王时的人 ( #王下 10:15| )
2) 玛基雅的父亲, 玛基雅在尼希米时代是伯哈基琳人的领袖, 他参与了
重建耶路撒冷城墙的工作 ( #尼 3:14| )
3) 伊施波设带领的两位军长之一, 他们背叛了伊施波设并谋刺了他 ( #撒下 4:2-6| )
利甲人 = 见利甲 "骑师" [参见7397]
形容词, 种族名称
4) 利甲的后裔

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.10.15;
son of: Hammath (H2575B);
father of: Jonadab (H3082)
Also named: re.kha.vi (רֵכָבִי "Rechabite" H7397A)
§ Rechab = "rider"
n pr m
1) father of Jehonadab in the time of king Jehu of the northern kingdom of Israel
2) father of Malchijah, a leader of the district of Beth Haccerem and repairer of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
3) one of the 2 captains whom Ishbosheth took into his service and who conspired to murder him
Rechabites = see Rechab "rider"
adj pr
4) descendants of Rechab

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.14;
father of: Malchijah (H4441N)
§ Rechab = "rider"
n pr m
1) father of Jehonadab in the time of king Jehu of the northern kingdom of Israel
2) father of Malchijah, a leader of the district of Beth Haccerem and repairer of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
3) one of the 2 captains whom Ishbosheth took into his service and who conspired to murder him
Rechabites = see Rechab "rider"
adj pr
4) descendants of Rechab
